ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
It's the Spring Equinox and everything is awakening from the long winter sleep. Unfortunately that includes pesky pixies. One of whom steals the Black Rose birthmark right off Tarot's back! Joins us for Tarot's 5th year anniversary as she battles her way through the fairy realm to regain her birthmark. Makes a great jumping on point for new readers as well as another exciting read for her devoted fans!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 22:22:33. [CVDB121808]
